references.reason: This paper introduces the Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm, a crucial reinforcement learning method used in PaSa for training the Crawler agent.

references.paper_title: AGILE: A Novel Framework for LLM Agents
references.reason: AGILE is the reinforcement learning framework used in PaSa to jointly optimize the Crawler and Selector agents, a core component of the system's architecture.

references.paper_title: Which academic search systems are suitable for systematic reviews or meta-analyses? Evaluating retrieval qualities of Google Scholar, PubMed, and 26 other resources
references.reason: This paper highlights the limitations of existing academic search systems, providing context for the need for advanced methods like PaSa.

references.paper_title: Why not just Google it? An assessment of information literacy skills in a biomedical science curriculum
references.reason: This paper underscores the time-consuming nature of literature reviews in academic research, highlighting the need for efficient tools such as PaSa.
The GPT-4 model is used extensively in PaSa, both for the development of the AutoScholarQuery dataset and in the implementation of the PaSa-GPT-40 baseline, making this system card highly relevant.
